title: minecraft的开发日志~~第一篇
author: 阴暗处的陷阱师
txt_content:
Minecraft API Proposal System
October 22, 2012 – 6:36 PM by EvilSeph

Based on the feedback we had to the launch of Minecraft: Into the Void, it was clear that a lot of people missed the launch of the Minecraft API Proposal System. As such, I thought it would be a good idea to put up a post about it on our shiny new developer blog.
根据我们收集到最初对Minecraft的反馈，进入void，很明显很多人忘记启动“我的世界”的API请求系统。于是我认为写下关于我们新开发日志将是一个好主意.
Want to help us design the Minecraft API? We now have a system where you guys can tell us what you'd need from it on our Mojang issue tracker powered by Atlassian's JIRA. We're actively going through proposals to discuss whether or not we think they'll be a good fit within the API and provide suggestions for changes we think should be made to the proposals, so now would be a good time to share your needs for the API with us and other developers. If you think you have an idea for an addition to the API and a use case for it, feel free to post a proposal for it on the system. Other developers will then be able to actively discuss the pros and cons of it, provide suggestions for improvement and chime in on whether or not they'd like to be able to do the same thing.
你想帮我们设计M应用？我们现在有一个系统可以让你们提出在由Atlassian's JIRA图集的mojang数据库你们需要什么。我们非常乐意一起讨论哪些建议适合放到这个应用中以及进行修改，因此现在正是与我们还有其他开发者分享需求与创意的好时机！如果你有一个关于API的创意或者用户案例，请在我们系统上尽情提交你的创意吧~各位开发者也将对这些意见创意各抒己见。

You'll need an account on the Mojang JIRA to start submitting proposals and participating in discussions, as well as a GitHub account for when we actively make use of its pull request system in tandem with the proposals.
你需要在Mojang JIRA上注册一个账号来提交建议和参与讨论，还需要一个GitHub账号在我们做需求系统的时候用
Read important information about the Minecraft API Proposal System here and the Minecraft API Proposal System - Guidelines and Requirements before submitting a proposal.
请在提交建议之前认真阅读以下Minecraft API Proposal System 的重要信息
We look forward to learning what you'd like to be able to do with the Minecraft API!
我们期待收到你关于Minecraft API的建议！
那个API神马的就不用解释了吧，由于俺是个学生党，所以翻译得不太好请各位见谅
